messages.title: A MESSAGE FROM IAN WALKER
messages.content: Ian Walker stood for the Conservatives in Sheffield Hallam at the last election.

messages.title: A GREENER FUTURE FOR SHEFFIELD
messages.content: The Conservatives have announced the UK is going to be the first major economy to achieve net zero carbon emissions.

messages.title: RECORD INVESTMENT IN THE NHS
messages.content: Record discussions with Transport for the North, Highways England and the Treasury to ensure we get a better share of government spending.

messages.title: PUTTING SHEFFIELD ON THE TRANSPORT MAP
messages.content: I have discussed with Transport for the North, Highways England and the Treasury to ensure we get a better share of government spending for our region.

messages.title: CONSERVATIVES FOR SHEFFIELD HALLAM
messages.content: Sheffield Hallam needs a representative who will be a visible and vocal champion for the benefits to us all of a Conservative government at national level.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives have invested Â£250 million in the UKRI's Future Leaders Fellowships, Enhance Teaching, Powerhouse Schools Strategy to focus on ambitions, and endorse zero carbon emissions targets.
We need an MP who will support the government in getting Brexit over the line.

issues.brexitEurope: Delivering Brexit: We need an MP who will support the government in getting Brexit over the line.
issues.environment: A Greener Future for Sheffield: The Conservatives have invested in Future Leaders Fellowships, Enhance Teaching, Powerhouse Schools Strategy to focus on ambitions and endorse zero carbon emissions targets.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ian Walker stood for the Conservatives in Sheffield Hallam at the last election.

politicalExperience.achievements: Improving turnout in local schools, including early schools in Hallam.

quotes.text: Ian Walker stood for the Conservatives in Sheffield Hallam at the last election.
